entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.1°C

Visibility: 9.7 km

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
